scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:strapi && npm run setup:next
scripts.dev: npm run clear && concurrently "cd strapi && npm run develop" "cd next && npm run dev"
scripts.seed: cd strapi && npm run strapi import -- --file ../seed-data.tar.gz
scripts.config:dump: cd strapi && npm run strapi configuration:dump -- --file dump.json
scripts.config:restore: cd strapi && npm run strapi configuration:restore -- --file dump.json
scripts.export: cd strapi && npm run strapi export -- --no-encrypt --file ../seed-data
